Text:
Great film!

Have this on BR already...Thanks for another great title!
Auge, you're uploading film books as well! Imma start an Official Ague fan-club soon! :D

baybeh,

LOL, thank you.
I love watching film, talking about film, reading about film . . . ETC.
Absolutely none of my friends or coworkers are as passionate (or geeky) about film and film history as I am.
It is even hard to find cenephiles on-line with the same interest in old film . . . there is no problem finding folks that wanna talk about stuff that came out in the last 5-10 years. 
The books are to encourage those that do have interest.

Many are confused by Video_TS folders and VOB's, ISO's are clearly superior to my mind. Personally I prefer DVD9's then I can use the uncompressed video to create the finest x264 encodes & shrink to single layer via DVD Shrink with my own settings.

BTW Auge, keep those Criterions coming I am so grateful for your work.
